AbandonmentSignals.Title: N
AbandonmentSignals.Description: All races that have started are abandoned.

AbandonmentSignals.Title: N over H
AbandonmentSignals.Description: All races are abandoned. Further signals ashore.

AbandonmentSignals.Title: N over A
AbandonmentSignals.Description: All races are abandoned. No more racing today.

AbandonmentSignals.Title: V
AbandonmentSignals.Description: Monitor communication channel for safety instructions
